author: UltPanda
description: A comprehensive Pokemon cog for catching and training Pokemon in your Discord server. Features include wild Pokemon spawns, evolutions, special forms, team management, items, and more!
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Pokemon cog! Use `[p]help pokemon` to see all available commands. Start by setting a spawn channel with `[p]pokemon settings channel #channel-name`.
short: Catch and train Pokemon in your Discord server!
